short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cowboy Bebop Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Cowboy Bebop background. Cowboy Bebop wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Cowboy Bebop wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Set a random Cowboy Bebop background or select your favorite from the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Display the current date and time on each new tab.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Create shortcuts to your favorite websites for swift navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to more theme options.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Immediate download options for new wallpapers.
14. Quick links to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Cowboy Bebop tab.
